uientry.s:
local this = UIComponent(Address)
function ShowMenu(name) for i = 0, this:ChildCount() - 1 do local child = UIComponent(this:Find(i)) child:SetVisible(child:Id() == name) end end

uientry.unicode: Land battles are fought on land where the only aim is to decimate your enemies!||Try to use each battle's terrain to the best of your advantage.||Gain the higher ground where you can, forcing the enemy to attack uphill, making them tired and vunerable.||If you have troops that can hide in forests, have them lay in wait for the unsuspecting enemy before springing an ambush!
uientry.s:
function OnSelect() local this = UIComponent(Address) local panel = UIComponent(this:Parent("main_panel"))
panel:LuaCall("ClassicBattle") end

uientry.unicode: Land battles are fought on land where the only aim is to decimate your enemies!||Try to use each battle's terrain to the best of your advantage.||Gain the higher ground where you can, forcing the enemy to attack uphill, making them tired and vulnerable.||If you have troops that can hide in forests, have them lay in wait for the unsuspecting enemy before springing an ambush!

Wage war on the high seas, sinking your enemies into the briny depths.||The wind can be a friend or foe in these battles, try to sail in the same direction as the wind when you can to give your ships the advantage.||Sinking ships isn't the only way to remove them from the battle, try boarding an enemy ship and killing its crew!
uientry.s:
function OnSelect() local this = UIComponent(Address) local panel = UIComponent(this:Parent("main_panel"))
panel:LuaCall("SeaBattle") end

uientry.unicode: Wage war on the high seas, sinking your enemies into the briny depths.||The wind can be a friend or foe in these battles, try to sail in the same direction as the wind when you can to give your ships the advantage.||Sinking ships isn't the only way to remove them from the battle, try boarding an enemy ship and killing its crew!

In these battles you will play as either the defender or the attacker.||Attackers will need to siege and capture a settlement to achieve victory, whereas defenders will have to hold the attacker off until the time limit expires.
uientry.s:
function OnSelect() local this = UIComponent(Address) local panel = UIComponent(this:Parent("main_panel"))
panel:LuaCall("SiegeBattle") end

uientry.unicode: In these battles you will play as either the defender or the attacker.||Attackers will need to siege and capture a settlement to achieve victory, whereas defenders will have to hold the attacker off until the time limit expires.
These are battles with specific set ups and unique challenges.
uientry.s:
function OnSelect() local this = UIComponent(Address) local panel = UIComponent(this:Parent("main_panel"))
panel:LuaCall("HistoricBattle") end

uientry.unicode: These are battles with specific set ups and unique challenges.
